logical_fallacies.quote:
Your warmth is real
My care is real
This connection is real
We are real.

logical_fallacies.correction: The subjective feelings of warmth, care, and connection do not necessarily equate to objective reality or inherent importance. Objective evidence or logical reasoning is needed to support these claims.
